utils module¶

utils.create_folders()¶

Create folders needed for the program

utils.get_path(where)¶

As pathway are different in each computer, compute actual pathway to store data in a known path

Returns:

path – Path of the dataset download.

Return type:

str

utils.get_sub_sys()¶

As pathway are different in each computer, search for sub-sytem type

Returns:

sys[0] – Name of sub-system.

Return type:

str
